Module lanat
Package lanat

Class ErrorFormatter.ErrorFormatterGenerator

java.lang.Object
lanat.ErrorFormatter.ErrorFormatterGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ErrorLevelProvider
Enclosing class:
ErrorFormatter
public static class ErrorFormatter.ErrorFormatterGenerator extends Object implements ErrorLevelProvider
Class used to generate error messages from an ErrorFormatter instance.

Methods generate() and generateTokensView(DisplayTokensOptions) provide the functionality to generate the error message. These may be overridden to provide custom error messages.

Note: A single instance of this class is used to generate all messages for the errors.

    • getTokensView

      @NotNull protected final @NotNull String getTokensView()
      Returns the tokens view to be displayed to the user. This is the result of calling generateTokensView(DisplayTokensOptions) with the options provided in the ErrorFormatter
      Returns:
      The tokens view to be displayed to the user. An empty string if no tokens view options were provided.
